meanings.definition: Full of energy, enthusiasm, or determination.
meanings.sent1: The puppy was very spirited and loved to play all day.
meanings.sent2: She had a spirited debate with her friend about their favorite books.
meanings.sent3: The spirited squirrel raced around the tree, trying to catch its own tail.
meanings.sent4: Her spirited laughter filled the room, bringing joy to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The spirited dance performance left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: Having a specified character or quality.
meanings.sent1: The painting had a spirited touch, making it stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent2: He had a spirited personality that attracted many friends.
meanings.sent3: The spirited cake had a surprise filling that delighted everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her spirited determination to succeed inspired others around her.
meanings.sent5: The spirited colors of the sunset painted the sky in a beautiful hue.

meanings.sent1: The carnival was a spirited event with music and laughter filling the air.
meanings.sent2: The children's book had spirited illustrations that brought the story to life.
meanings.sent3: The spirited flowers in the garden seemed to dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her spirited performance on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The spirited conversation at the party kept everyone entertained.
